metadata.description: Where do old superfolk go when it's time to get out of the game? To Valhalla -- Home for the Supertired. But wait! Just when the heroic Captain Spectacular, the stealthy and sexy Spy Gal, the villainous Dr. Rocket, and the cranky speedster Swifty think they've earned their rest, new evils and terrible secrets rise to threaten everything.
metadata.name: The SuperFogeys
